title: Create real account Send
description: This call opens a new real-money account. Note: you must be authenticated to a virtual-money account to call this function.

salutation.description: Accept any value in enum list.

first_name.description: Within 2-30 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

last_name.description: Within 2-30 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

residence.description: 2-letter country code, possible value receive from residence_list call.

address_state.description: Optional field, possible value receive from states_list call.

address_postcode.description: Optional field, within 20 characters and may not contain '+'.

phone.description: Within 6-35 digits, allowing '+' in front, numbers or space.

secret_question.description: Accept any value in enum list. Required for new account and existing client details will be used if client open another account.

secret_answer.description: Answer to secret question, within 4-50 characters. Required for new account and existing client details will be used if client open another account.

tax_residence.description: Residence for tax purpose. Comma separated iso country code if multiple jurisdictions. Only applicable for real money account. Required for maltainvest landing company.

tax_identification_number.description: Tax identification number. Only applicable for real money account. Required for maltainvest landing company.

account_opening_reason.description: Purpose and reason for requesting the account opening

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
